title: Assaulting or wilfully disobeying superior commissioned officer
context: [ยง124A-125] Assaulting or wilfully disobeying superior commissioned officer. Any person subject to this chapter who: (1) Strikes the person&rsquo;s superior commissioned officer or draws or lifts up any weapon or offers any violence against the superior commissioned officer while the officer is in the execution of this office; or (2) Wilfully disobeys a lawful command of the person&rsquo;s superior commissioned officer; shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
